name: Marital Status NHS Data Model and Dictionary
description: A vocabulary that identifies the legal marital status of a person. This value set references the Person Marital Status Code from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

concept.display: Divorced/Person whose Civil Partnership has been dissolved
